component.name: Yt Downloader
Téléchargeur de vidéos
component.summary: Download videos and music from various sources.

description.p: A simple-to-use tool to download videos or audios from various sources including Youtube, Dailymotion, Vimeo... It support more than 1000 websites and 8 different formats including mp3, mp4 and webm. You can chose between different resolutions and audio quality. It also support downloading whole playlists.

Un outil de téléchargement de vidéos et d’audios simple supportant de nombreux sites comme Youtube, Dailymotion, Vimeo... Il supporte plus de 1000 sites différents et 8 types de fichier différents dont mp3, mp4 et webm. Il permet aussi de choisir entre plusieurs résolutions et qualités de l’audio. Il propose aussi de télécharger des playlists entières en un seul clic.

description.p: This release features several major improvements:
Embed subtitles in videos when possible.
Migration from youtube-dl to yt-dlp backend that support several new features and sources
It is also the first release of this fork.
